ygData.subject: RE: FW: About the Bard running in the Rathe Mnts.
ygData.msgSnippet: Um the bard in Rathe is not Sainy.  Sainy so far has sung only on faydwer and is accompanied by a drake at all times.  So far I have not seen her use Selos
ygData.messageBody:
Um the bard in Rathe is not Sainy. Sainy so far has sung only on faydwer
and is accompanied by a drake at all times. So far I have not seen her use
Selos either

-----Original Message-----
From: sentto-160851-15483-firehawk=cloud9.net@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-15483-firehawk=cloud9.net@...]On
Behalf Of Pinen
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 7:24 PM
To: Eqbards@...
Subject: [eqbards] FW: About the Bard running in the Rathe Mnts.


From: "Pinen" <ubersorcerer@...>


-----Original Message-----
From: TommyC [mailto:maxcool2@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 6:47 PM
To: Eqbards@...
Subject: About the Bard running in the Rathe Mnts.


The bard was a GM and this looks like the beginning of one hellified
quest / event
The Tale of Veeshans Veil

A drake perches on Sainy's head.
From the worlds core, the rock children rose, Shielded from wurms eyes by
dirt and stone.
With gnarled hands and broken bones, they carved their place into Veeshans
Home.
Soon after, the woodlands and deserts and swamps. All nurtured life
planted by interloping Gods.
Veeshan left her children, in peaks carved by her claws, turned her back
on Norrath, and her fellow Gods laws.
The Crystalline Dragon content in her lair, Sealed off Sky and still
slumbers there.
Some dragons went mad, apart from their queen, Others took charge and
formed a wurm ring.
The rebels were hunted and sent from the peaks, To dwell in the lands
inhabited by the weak.
One of these rebels a lady white as snow, Swept up a shard of nature
unknown.
As years dragged on one by one the wurms fell, Into a deep slumber from
what no one could tell.
Their magic had faded, because of the shard? Or perhaps from the magic
they call Veeshans Veil.
Now a new verse to this legend Ill share. In regards to the Sky and what
is happening there.
Veeshan still slumbers, the veil has worn thin, The Wurm Queen neglect
wakes her children again.
My song is done, but I will warn you to heed the words of my verse for the
speak the truth. Mortals now visit where Veeshan slumbers, and only dragons
once dwelled.
A drake puffs its chest with pride.
But the door to the Sky is not a one way portal. There is much to learn
from the great Wurms, and much to fear.
Sainy bows.
Come my friend it is time to move on.
A drake purrs.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
